Takes stS, splits into principal and yield tokens, sells yield tokens         for stable coins, deposits stable coins for extra yield. Holds principal         tokens until withdrawal. Converts everything back to stS when withdrawing This strategy locks in fixed yield by selling future earnings upfront. User deposits stS, Pendle splits it into principal and yield tokens, yield tokens get sold immediately for stable coins (guaranteed income), stable coins earn extra yield in lending protocol. When withdrawing, redeem principal tokens and convert stable coins back to stS. Result: more predictable returns than normal 995cf570c531fe982daf61565b41b6dfec49a8a58ac9010aedb595a","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://18af27ec021ed495a01f9b3c327e52508d3a94d0b79275c0dc26c63fc3f5d770","dweb:/ipfs/QmbVCZFwmD96H8Vqq75pFsNqW54YtukA5aPjEuqq3jRVgz"]},"src/interfaces/adapters/IPendleAdapter.sol":{"keccak256":"0x039f2980687fae8c97050e0e8f195fb620b58bd75ee6003c4c285fe4f52b28b7","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://223c83b8134efa6b4a444dca6beb22b32f32c16674e67cbedf59984960a12321","dweb:/ipfs/QmSg73ndzfK3xxNLBMLk63UYfFTDvCpsbkb5MQCU5D7SQB"]},"src/strategies/BaseStrategy.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb26b7e25ae3e75a9933457c631131af7daa0f025091547beedfb331044b4e506","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://fd7d37a2ead3f0b70c42a4fa69ebda7f7f78748986551160d35e7acaa9275366","dweb:/ipfs/Qmbm1Lnucv8QNVABoRwLQPLeZ82a7SZLKbdR32gu8wmpqG"]},"src/strategies/PendleFixedYieldStSStrategy.sol":{"keccak256":"0x15c2f3023772e265d501fa23ba57759998f747e911c2632f2daaa24e818a36c2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://42cab74256be7904e7dc5e61fa50d56efe5928d85ba69328c3f3c4d3fd5e594f","dweb:/ipfs/QmVDHPF7TDAD6B1cWKHMBB2ceRAXzE1UuMEXgqHgqhiWyg"]}},"version":1}

params._lendingAdapter: Lending adapter address for stable coin deposits
params._stS: stS token address (what the vault holds)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

LENDING().notice: Lending adapter to deposit stable coins and earn extra yield         on the money from selling yield tokens

PENDLE().notice: Pendle adapter for splitting stS into principal/yield tokens,         selling yield tokens, and converting between stable coins and stS

STABLE().notice: Stable coin address (like scUSD) we get from selling yield tokens.         The adapter tells us what stable coin to use

apy().notice: Get current yield percentage. Returns the lending yield on stable coins.         The fixed yield from Pendle is locked in at deposit time so not shown here

components().notice: Return component list for off-chain introspection

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit stS tokens into the strategy. Splits into principal/yield tokens,         sells yield tokens for stable coins, deposits stable coins for extra yield

harvest().notice: Collect yield from stable coin deposits. Withdraws stable coins         that have grown from lending yield, converts them to stS

ptBalance().notice: How many principal tokens we're holding. These tokens can be         redeemed for stS at maturity. We redeem them proportionally on withdrawals

totalAssets().notice: Calculate total value in stS terms. Includes free stS,         stable coin deposits (assuming 1:1 conversion), and principal tokens.         Real implementation would use price oracles for accurate pricing

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw stS back to vault. Uses free stS first, then redeems         principal tokens and converts stable coins back to stS as needed.         Leftover principal/stable coins stay invested
